description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Course Updated 6 April 2016

Why are 44,140 students wanting me to mentor them in 41 Udemy courses? 41,140 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015 (that's just 8 months!)

Shouldn't you find out why? 28 of those courses were created within 12 weeks of launching my first course!

If you want rapid course creation techniques, then this is the course for you. I have used the EXACT methods in this course to create my other courses (and I have even more courses in the pipeline)

THREE New Lectures Added!

Multiple 5 Star reviews. Thank you for letting me mentor you!

Here's a FIVE star review of the D.R.E.A.M System:

"Great and Quick!

Thanks for the great information what i liked the most is the D.R.E.A.M principle. it was simple and powerful to me the course gave me some great ideas and i will start implementing today! Glad to be the first student to review this course and highly recommend it :) "

This course will show you how to make your first Udemy (or your next Udemy course) fast!

With the tools I show you, you will be able to confidently make great quality courses with minimal fuss.

Using the proven D.R.E.A.M System demonstrated in this course, you will be able to create your courses quickly. Not only will you be able to get your course completed quickly, you will also get a number of ideas of additional courses for you to create.

You will also learn how to research course topics and also learn how to review other instructor courses (and learn tricks to actually make your course much better!)

You will love going through this course as its step by step, and the steps are easy to follow. All videos are in high quality HD quality.

Once you are finished this course, you will be ready to submit your course for approval.

Best of all, you don't need any experience to take this course and the equipment required is minimal to begin.

You will be using the Camtasia screen capture software and I will teach you exactly how I use it (no fancy graphics or audio). The idea is to get a course done quickly and once its available for sale you can either polish your existing course or simply create a new one!
title: The Simple Way Of Building Udemy Courses Fast - Unofficial
